## useWireValue() function

returns wire value and subscribe to wire for value updates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useWireValue<Value>(
  wire: Subscribable<Value> | null | undefined,
  defaultValue: Value,
): Value | undefined;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                                                                | Description                             |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| wire         | <code>Subscribable&lt;Value&gt; &#124; null &#124; undefined</code> |                                         |
| defaultValue | <code>Value</code>                                                  | return value if wire value is undefined |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Value | undefined`

## Remarks

please always pass same wire param and avoid changing wire param, it can cause strange behavior and bad intermediate values
